revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox dungeon |name = Brawlers' Cave |image = [[File:Brawlers Cave.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Brawlers' Cave. |tokens = 1,730,000 |location = East of Forest of Focus }} '''Brawlers' Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 27,009,504 HP. == Encou..."
